name: GPSTest
shortDescription: GPSTest displays real-time information for GNSS and SBAS satellites in view of your device. A vital open-source testing tool for platform engineers, developers, and power users, GPSTest gives you direct insight into how your device computes it's location, including support for dual-frequency (L5 and E5a) signals, and helps you measure actual GNSS accuracy. Privacy-sensitive - no ads or trackers are included, data stays on your device unless you choose to share it.
longDescription: GPSTest displays real-time information for GNSS and SBAS satellites in view of your device. A vital open-source testing tool for platform engineers, developers, and power users, GPSTest gives you direct insight into how your device computes it's location, including support for dual-frequency (L5 and E5a) signals, and helps you measure actual GNSS accuracy. Privacy-sensitive - no ads or trackers are included, data stays on your device unless you choose to share it.
